column4: hello fellows, maybe here is not the place to post this question. Bu I need help with web control panels
I have a website which does not have cpanl
cpanel
I know it has another control panel
but don't remember its name
Does someone know another type of control panel for web hosting?
oh, that may be
let me trty
webmin is used for server config mostly, not for virutal hosts (shared web hosting)
thanks
I trtried webmin and no answer
what are you trying to do? log into something?
scary.
I am trying to log to site.org.uy/controlpanel
but I don't remember the controlpanel name
and there set the users webmail space usage
for instancece I can access site.org.uy/webmail

you'll have to contact your host. its different depending on what you have and how its set up. most places use just ip:port and maybe they have a domain.com/cpanel forward to that. you know you have to use https:// right?
It seems it was /admin . I was lucky. Thanks to you I remembered (I supposed webim had the word admin in it :P )
yeah they just have a redirect set up for you. neato.
thanks a lot
Nice to find people eager to help around here ;)
